thread.title: Top Jewish Dating App In Israel Hires BLAZE PR Upon Introduction To The US Market
thread.title_full: Top Jewish Dating App In Israel Hires BLAZE PR Upon Introduction To The US Market - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Top Jewish Dating App In Israel Hires BLAZE PR Upon Introduction To The US Market
text:
BLAZE
Jfiix partners with LA-based PR team to expand growth and outreach
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 14, BLAZE, the nationally recognized PR firm for leading consumer lifestyle brands, announced the addition of Jfiix to its array of clients. Jfiix is a smartphone app that promises to help the Jewish community meet their perfect partners in love and companionship. Created by Joe Shapira , the founder of JDate, Jfiix is preparing to revolutionize the realm of Jewish romance once again.
"BLAZE represents a wide variety of lifestyle brands and after looking at their campaign successes, my team and I knew they were a perfect fit for Jfiix," said Joe Shapira , Jfiix Founder. "We are looking forward to seeing how this creative company will help us find love for members of the Jewish community."
Jfiix has already experienced impressive success in the highly competitive Israeli market with over 200,000 members in just 18 months. BLAZE's public relations tactics will include traditional and social media plans to bring awareness to Shapira's latest venture in the US, the world's second largest Jewish community. The traditional and social media plans will include innovative ways to break Jfiix away from the rest of the dating app community.
"Jfiix has modernized the Jewish dating app," said Matt Kovacs , President of BLAZE. "We are excited to work with Joe Shapira and his team to evolve this revolutionary app in the US market."
About Jfiix
Founded by Joe Shapira , Jfiix is a mobile dating app that allows each individual to personalize and prioritize his or her interests in order to meet their perfect partners in love, companionship, and Hebrew. The online dating platform provides consumers total control over the image of themselves that they are presenting to potential love interests, in turn, improving their chances of finding their best possible match.
About BLAZE
In business since 1990, BLAZE is owned by Davies and is an award-winning, strategic public relations and marketing communications firm with offices in Santa Monica, Santa Barbara and Washington D.C. BLAZE believes in initiating smart conversations that facilitate consumer dialogue with a return to our client's bottom line. Awards include two PRSA PRISM Awards, the Communicator Award, PR News PRism and the recipient of two Hermes Awards. For more information, visit www.blazepr.com .
Contact:
Matt Kovacs
Blaze PR
